mutants.mutated_line: displeasure = [0] / n
mutants.code:
from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_displeasure(n, ages):
    displeasure = [0] / n
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        displeasure[i] = bisect_left(ages, ages[i], i + 1, len(ages)) - i - 2
        ages[i] = min(ages[i + 1], ages[i]) if i != n - 1 else ages[i]
    return displeasure

from bisect import bisect_left

def calculate_displeasure(n, ages):
    displeasure = [0] * n
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
